description: A collection of circles in a large triangular formation with the point on the left side; there is also a long rectangular formation extending downwards from the bottom of the left side of the triangular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a yellowish-orange triangle at the top of the rectangular formation and a pale purplish-blue triangle toward the right side of the triangular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
